title: Handle an Airport Pickup Request
description: A rider at an airport requests a ride. The system must guide them to the designated ride-share pickup area and manage the driver queue.

tasks.description: A rider requests a ride from within the airport's geofence.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies it as an airport pickup.

tasks.description: The app displays instructions for the rider to proceed to the designated pickup zone (e.g., 'Level 3, Zone C').
tasks.expected_outcome: The rider is given clear walking directions.

tasks.description: The system places the request in a virtual queue and offers it to the next driver waiting in the airport's designated driver waiting area (geofenced lot).
tasks.expected_outcome: The request is offered to the first driver in the queue.

tasks.description: A driver accepts, and is given a specific lane number to meet their rider.
tasks.expected_outcome: The rider and driver are matched and guided to each other efficiently.
